TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Yes the soup won the KSP Easter egg contest

Waiter!

Spoiler

S O U P

Catch!

 

Waiter! Why are the flies falling down on flying above my soup?

We decided to try our fly-killing-field on your soup. It needs some improvement.

 

 

Waiter! There is soup in my bowl!

It's a souper-bowling, and we welcome you!

Waiter! We ski.

Waiter: Yes it is Yoghurt soup.

Customer: Waiter, there is a limmerick in my soup.

Twas made by a chef named O'Brian

Who burned his hand so he was crying....

 

Waiter! There is an incomplete thought in my soup!

Yes, it's a soup made of cow brains.

Waiter! Please, ask your cook to add some soup to the pepper next time.

Sure thing, fella.

 

Waiter! There's a revolution going on in my soup!

Noooo... The revolution will be going on in your stomach.

Waiter! Are you sure if this oil is not shale?

DID YOU JUST SAY OIL? AMERICANS ARE GOING TO ATTACK US JUST TO GET OIL...

Waiter! There's Jool in my soup!

It isn't. Just a meatball became a little greenish.

Waiter! Was this meat vacuum-packed? It looks Martian.

Yes it was, it's from our newest delivery from Mars!

 

 

Waiter! There are islands in my soup!

Yes you bought the Caribbean islands soup

Waiter! My there’s a Shturm ATGM in my soup!

Edited July 25, 2021 by Stormpilot

Waiter: You did ask for alphabet soup.

Customer: Waiter, there is a mission impossible in my soup.

Oops, sorry. Probably somebody in the kitchen missed, and the mission hit your plate.

Soup! Where is the waiter?

Ah yes you ordered the waiter soup. He will appear when you breath and you will choke. THERE IS NO HIDING FROM WAITER. Enjoy your soup.

Waiter! There is a cat in my soup!

This is the chinese restaurant, what do you expect?

Waiter! There is a soupermarket in my soup!

It's a part of our new souper soup meal. Choose the extras and pay at the bowl.

 

Waiter! There's an empty hagen dazs container in my soup!

Oh wh- BILL DID YOU EAT THE ICE CREAM?

waiter! There’s a grzegorz brzęczyszczykiewicz in my soup!

Don't show off, use cyrillic: гжегож бженчищикевич. Much shorter and more readable.

Waiter! What sounds was this meat making when being pre-meat? Barking? Hissing?

It didn't make any sound. The meat is not from the part of the animal that makes sounds.

 

 

!puos ni ym esrever ni klat elpoep sekam taht gnihtemos s'erehT !retiaW

 

Spoiler

Normal: Waiter! There's something that makes people talk in reverse in my soup!

 

Edited July 26, 2021 by Maria Sirona
Changed eploep to elpoep

Stop messing with that book! Don’t you know it does bad things?,

Waiter! There is an End Portal in my soup!

This is an extra to our blocky soup. 1 out of a million gets it.

Waiter! There is Danny2462 in my soup!

Quick! Get all spacecraft parts out of his sight before he thinks of something again!

 

 

Waiter! There's a Rick Astley in my soup singing Never Gonna Give You Up!

And you win a portion of our rick rolls for freeeeeee!!!

Was Obi One Wasabi a Tattooine Tattoo master?
